'Carlos Casares Partido' is a partido of Buenos Aires Province in Argentina.

The provincial subdivision has a population of about 21,000 inhabitants in an
area of 2,520 kmÂ², and its capital city is Carlos Casares, which is located
around 257 km from Buenos Aires.
